title: Gradle copying artifacts for native build failed with Permission denied
body:
### Describe the bug

Similar to https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/33842, gradle QarkusBuildTask fails to copy readonly file from the native build source dir (`nativeImageSourceJarDirName() + "/**"))`).

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/382cf447d81f831e8830b5ffe2e2e512803d91ac/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusBuild.java#L340-L361



### Expected behavior

Build is sucessful

### Actual behavior

Build failed

```
> Task :quarkusBuild FAILED
Caching disabled for task ':quarkusBuild' because:
  Build cache is disabled
Task ':quarkusBuild' is not up-to-date because:
  Task has failed previously.
Removing output files and directories (provide a clean state).
Synchronizing Quarkus native build from /home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/quarkus-build/app/quarkus-app and /home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/quarkus-build/dep into /home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/quarkus-app
file or directory '/home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/quarkus-build/app/quarkus-app', not found
Copying remaining Quarkus application artifacts for native build from /home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/quarkus-build/app into /home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build
Build c9733143-e847-4e44-9888-17992dff296e is closed

[Incubating] Problems report is available at: file:///home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/reports/problems/problems-report.html

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':quarkusBuild'.
> Could not copy file '/home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/quarkus-build/app/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-native-image-source-jar/libaws-crt-jni.so' to '/home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-native-image-source-jar/libaws-crt-jni.so'.
   > /home/user/source/quarkus/test/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue/build/quarkus-amazon-services-crt-client-issue-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-native-image-source-jar/libaws-crt-jni.so (Permission denied)

```

### How to Reproduce?

More info and a reproducer at https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-amazon-services/issues/1694
